column4: i would like to install some 3d desktop on my ubuntu feisty. i tried before but it crashed my computer, i panicked and i deleted all the files related to it. now is there someone that could explain me how do i get that 3d desktop without killing my computer please?

3d desktop is buggy at best its still beta if your hardware didnt support it look around for how to make it work and if you cant find anything discussing your hardware then give it a while and wait for the next beta
i successed to install beryl a long time ago (i was with kubuntu 6.10) and it was buggy but it was working. i heard compiz is more stable. is that really true?
